/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and shrubs, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Buildings flank the street on both sides, their facades bathed in sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
